content: Send your request to our support team, and our specialists will help you with the settings.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a message displayed when sending a request for DNS settings support, guiding users to contact specialists for assistance. It appears in the Portal Settings page on a mobile device and is intended to inform users about the next steps to resolve their issue.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Send your request" is translated as "أرسل طلبك" which is generally correct, but a more natural and user-friendly phrasing in this context might be "قم بإرسال طلبك" (Qum bi irsal talabak) - 'Please send your request'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بإرسال طلبك إلى فريق الدعم لدينا

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'settings' (DNSSettingsMobile) is translated as 'parametrler'. While 'parametrler' can mean parameters or settings, it's not the most natural or direct translation of 'settings' in this context. A more accurate translation would be 'parametrleri' or 'qurğulama'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sorğunuzu dəstək komandamıza göndərin və mütəxəssislərimiz sizə parametrleri/qurğulama kömək edəcəklər.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'support team' is translated as 'екип за обслужване на клиенти'. While accurate, a more direct translation of 'support team' could be 'екип за поддръжка', which may sound more natural in this context. 'Обслужване на клиенти' implies a broader scope of customer service, not just technical support.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'support team' as 'екип за поддръжка'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "with the settings" in the English content implies assistance *regarding* the settings, not necessarily *with* the settings themselves. While "asetusten kanssa" is grammatically correct, it's not the most natural translation for this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lähetä pyyntösi tukitiimillemme ja asiantuntijamme auttavat sinua asetuksissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'help you with the settings' is not accurately reflected by 'vous aideront à définir les paramètres'. While 'aider' is correct, 'définir les paramètres' implies setting up the parameters which isn't precisely what the English implies (assistance with existing settings). A more accurate translation would focus on assisting with the settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Envoyez votre demande à notre équipe de support et nos spécialistes vous aideront avec les paramètres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "կարգավորումներում" (kargavorumnerum) implies 'in settings' rather than 'with settings'. A more accurate translation would reflect helping *with* the settings, not just being *in* them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ուղարկեք ձեր հարցումը մեր աջակցման թիմին, և մեր մասնագետները կօգնեն ձեզ կարգավորումների հետ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send your request' is not accurately conveyed. '요청을 보내면' (yo cheong eul boe myeon) literally translates to 'if you send a request'. A more accurate translation would imply a proactive offering of help.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 지원팀에 문의하시면 저희측 전문가가 설정을 도와드리겠습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, '저희측 전문가' sounds slightly formal and could be simplified. The phrase can be shortened while retaining the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 저희 전문가가

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຕັ້ງຄ່າ' (settings) is correctly spelled, but should be consistent with the English term 'settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ' (the setting) might be more appropriate depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "settings" is translated as "konfiguracji" in Polish. While "konfiguracja" can mean settings, it implies a more technical configuration. "Ustawienia" would be a more direct and natural translation of "settings" in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyślij prośbę do naszego zespołu obsługi klienta, a nasi specjaliści pomogą Ci w ustawieniach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'equipa de apoio ao cliente' is a bit verbose and not a direct translation of 'support team.' A more concise and natural translation would be 'equipa de suporte'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Equipa de suporte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While '(a)' is grammatically correct for gender neutrality, it can appear slightly awkward. Depending on the brand voice, removing it might read more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Envie o seu pedido para a nossa equipa de apoio ao cliente, e os nossos especialistas vão ajudá-lo com as configurações.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'care este gata să vă ajute cu setarea' is slightly awkward. 'Setarea' is singular and implies one setting. The English refers to 'the settings' implying multiple settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trimiteţi solicitarea către echipa noastră de asistenţă, care este gata să vă ajute cu setările.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Trimiteţi' is formal. 'Trimite' would be more conversational, which might be more appropriate depending on the tone desired.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trimite solicitarea către echipa noastră de asistenţă, care este gata să vă ajute cu setările.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔවුන් මෙය සැකසීමට උපකාර කරනු ඇත' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'our specialists will help you with the settings'. 'මෙය' (this) is vague and doesn't specify what 'they' will help with. A more accurate translation of 'help you with the settings' is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔවුන් ඔබේ සැකසීම් වලට උදව් කරනු ඇත. (They will help with your settings.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically acceptable, the sentence structure 'ඔවුන් ඔබේ සැකසීම් වලට උදව් කරනු ඇත' could be slightly improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔවුන් ඔබේ සැකසීම් සඳහා උදව් කරනු ඇත. (They will help with your settings.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'support team' is translated as 'skupini za podporo' which, while understandable, isn't the most natural phrasing in Slovenian. 'Ekipa za podporo' would be a more common and fluent translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ekipa za podporo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'strokovnjaki bodo pomagali pri nastavitvah' is technically correct, it sounds slightly formal for the context. A more conversational and natural translation would be 'strokovnjaki vam bomo pomagali z nastavitvami' or 'strokovnjaki vam bomo pomagali pri reševanju nastavitve'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: strokovnjaki vam bomo pomagali z nastavitvami

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "са подешавањима" literally translates to "with settings". It's more natural in Serbian to use a construction implying "regarding settings" or "for the settings".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пошаљите ваш захтев нашем тиму за подршку, и наши специјалисти ће вам помоћи око подешавања.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'with the settings' is not accurately translated. 'Podešavanjima' implies adjustment or modification, not simply assistance with the settings themselves. A more accurate translation would convey 'regarding the settings' or 'for the settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pošaljite vaš zahtev našem timu za podršku, i naši specijalisti će vam pomoći sa podešavanjima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "with the settings" is somewhat vague. While "ayarlar konusunda" can translate to "regarding settings," it doesn't fully capture the nuance of assistance *with* the settings. A more accurate translation would imply help *in configuring* the settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İsteğinizi destek ekibimize gönderin, uzmanlarımız ayarlarınızı yapılandırmanıza yardımcı olacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'параметрами' (parametry) is a less common and slightly formal term. 'Налаштуваннями' (nalashtuvamy) would be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Надішліть запит до нашої служби підтримки, і наші спеціалісти допоможуть вам із налаштуваннями.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "settings" is not accurately translated. "cài đặt" typically means 'installation' or 'to install', not 'settings'. The translation misses the nuance of configuring settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gửi yêu cầu của bạn đến nhóm hỗ trợ của chúng tôi và các chuyên gia của chúng tôi sẽ giúp bạn với các thiết lập.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "help you with the settings" is translated as "帮助您进行设置". While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be "协助您配置设置" or "协助您设置".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 协助您配置设置
